1.07.name: wordpress/trialpay-widget
1.07.description:
Easily integrate TrialPay payments into your Wordpress site. TrialPay lets your visitors donate to your site by signing up for offers from TrialPay partners such as Geico, Discover, American Express, Blockbuster, and 100s of others. When they sign up, YOU get paid!
Configure the Widget settings in the 'Presentation | Widgets' section of the Dashboard.
